name: Mush (itch) (TheCabbageKnight)
description:
“Mush”

By Egg Warlock Games (Posted on my account because of laziness)

Mush is a 2D side scrolling platformer where you play as a seemingly cute alien glutton whos hunger can only be satiated by beans living on a distant planet, slowly becoming a monster the more beans he devours.

This game was made at the Sno-isle Tech VGD class for the quarter 2 project.  The prompt for this game was "Eat Squishy Beans"

Credits (More detailed credits in game):

  • Trent: Producer & Programmer
  • Evan: Lead Programmer
  • Eric: Programmer
  • Logan: Programmer
  • Adam: Lead Animator
  • Taya: Animator
  • Kadence: Animator
  • Olivia: Animator
